steps.title: Combine Dry Ingredients
steps.description: Mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.

steps.title: Combine Wet Ingredients
steps.description: In a separate bowl, cream together melted butter and sugar. Add egg, milk, and vanilla to the mixture.

steps.title: Mix Ingredients
steps.description: Combine wet and dry ingredients. Fold in chocolate chips.

steps.title: Bake
steps.description: Fill muffin cups to the brim with batter. Bake at 425 degrees Fahrenheit for 5 minutes.

steps.title: Continue Baking
steps.description: Reduce heat to 375 degrees Fahrenheit and bake an additional 13-15 minutes. Sprinkle with mini chocolate chips if desired.
